name: ResumeGen
desc: ReactJS Basic Resume Generator which will generate customized resume in few minutes on your requirements.

name: Sale House Price Prediction
desc: Innovative web application designed for predicting house prices using machine learning algorithms. Built with Python, leveraging powerful libraries such as Pandas for data manipulation and Matplotlib for data visualization. Developed in Anaconda for efficient package management and environment setup, the app integrates machine learning techniques to analyze real estate data and provide accurate price predictions based on various features.

name: HR Website
desc: Comprehensive HR Management System that facilitates employee recruitment, onboarding, and management through a user-friendly interface. Built using Python, Django, Django ORM, PostgreSQL, and Django views (HTML, JSON, XML, etc.) to streamline HR processes and enhance organizational efficiency.

name: Student Online Registration
desc: Developed a comprehensive Student Online Registration system following the MVT (Model-View-Template) design pattern. This CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) application was built using Python and Django, leveraging Django ORM for database interactions and SQLite as the database. The project includes dynamic views that handle various response formats such as HTML, JSON, and XML, offering a robust and scalable solution for managing student registrations.
